Asset.Name: Hide Shield
Asset.Description: Your first quest is to find a Glimmering Ruby for Shed-darr The Wise. He will give you the Hide Shield in return.
Asset.ObjectiveMessage: Look for a nearby chest that contains the Glimmering Ruby.
Asset.CompletionMessage: Thank you for the Glimmering Ruby. I shall reward you with the Hide Shield. Go to the Inventory screen and equip it now!
Asset.DestinationObjectiveMessage: Go and speak with Shed-darr the Wise.
